nodes.bodyText: FragmentActivity seems to be added in API 22, however the documentation says it's in AndroidX jetpack, did we test this on lower level devices (SDK 21 or below)?
This method is used both by EmbeddedWebViewStrategy and BrowserStrategy. Shouldn't this be only for Webview ? i.e. in case of browser, what does adding a fragment do ?

AuthorizationFragment will be launched, which in turn would launch CustomTabsActivity - inside onResume().
CustomTabsActivity will be popped up and take the whole screen. It won't be displayed in-line in the specified fragment area.
I was considering extracting Browser logic out of AuthorizationFragment, but decided not to do so as there are lifecycle-dependent code that are shared by both Browser and WebView flows.
